TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit QueryStringParameter extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter

summary.span: 将 HTTP 请求查询字符串字段的值绑定到参数对象。

span.span: Binds the value of an HTTP request query-string field to a parameter object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用类将作为 HTTP 请求查询字符串的一部分传递的字段的值绑定到参数化的查询或命令中使用的参数。You can use the class to bind the value of a field that is passed as part of an HTTP request query string to a parameter that is used in a parameterized query or command. 该字段从集合中检索。The field is retrieved from the collection. 如果引用了对象, 但未传递相应的查询字符串名称/值对, 则将数据绑定到参数的控件可能会引发异常。Controls that bind data to the parameter might throw an exception if a object is referenced, but no corresponding query-string name/value pair is passed. 同样, 如果传递的查询字符串字段名称没有相应的值, 则它们可能不显示任何数据。Similarly, they might display no data if the query-string field name is passed without a corresponding value. 若要避免出现这种情况 , 请在适当的位置设置属性。To avoid these situations, set the property where appropriate. 类提供属性, 该属性标识要绑定到的查询字符串值的名称。The class provides the property, which identifies the name of the query string value to bind to. 它还提供从类继承的属性。It also provides the properties that are inherited from the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 类不会验证传递的值; 它提供原始值。The class does not validate the value that is passed; it provides the raw value. 但是, 可以在数据源控件中验证对象的值。However, you can validate the value of a object in a data source control. 为此, 请`Selecting`处理数据源控件的、 `Deleting` `Updating`、 `Inserting`或事件, 并在事件处理程序中检查参数值。To do so, handle the `Selecting`, `Updating`, `Inserting`, or `Deleting` event of the data source control and check the parameter value in the event handler. 如果参数的值未通过验证测试, 则可以通过将关联 类的属性设置为来`true`取消数据操作。If the value of the parameter does not pass the validation tests, you can cancel the data operation by setting the property of the associated class to `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建在控件中显示数据时用作筛选器的对象。The following example shows how to create a object to use as a filter when you display data in a control. 将对象添加到控件的集合。You add the object to the control's collection. 参数对象将名`country`为的查询字符串字段的值绑定到其字符串。The parameter object binds the value of the query-string field named `country` to its string. 由于没有为该参数指定任何属性, 因此, 如果没有`country`与查询字符串一起传递名为的字段, 则控件将引发异常。Because no property is specified for the parameter, if no field named `country` is passed with the query string, the control throws a exception. 如果传递了名`country`为的字段, 但没有值, 则控件不显示任何数据。If a field named `country` is passed but has no value, the control displays no data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_4/CS/qsp4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_4/VB/qsp4vb.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示如何通过使用参数化 SQL 查询创建对象以显示 Access 数据库中的数据。The following example shows how to create a object to display data from an Access database by using a parameterized SQL query. 对象检索随后显示在控件中的记录。 The object retrieves records that are then displayed in a control. 该控件也可编辑, 并允许用户更新 Northwind 商贸 orders 表中订单的状态。The control is also editable, and lets users update the status of orders in the Northwind Traders Orders table. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql/CS/sql22cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql/VB/sql22vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的未命名新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new unnamed instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用构造函数创建的对象将用其所有属性的默认值初始化。 A object that is created by using the constructor is initialized with default values for all its properties. 属性的初始化如下:The properties are initialized as follows: - 初始化为空字符串 ("")。 is initialized to an empty string (""). - 初始化为空字符串 ("")。 is initialized to an empty string (""). - 初始化为 。 is initialized to . - 初始化为 。 is initialized to . - 初始化为 `null`。 is initialized to `null`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用构造函数创建新的参数并将其添加到控件的集合中。The following example shows how to use the constructor to create a new parameter and add it to the collection of an control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1/CS/querystrparam1cs.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1/VB/querystrparam1vb.aspx.vb#2)] 对象将添加到控件, 并在 ASP.NET 网页中声明。 The object is added to the control and is declared in an ASP.NET Web page. 每次请求页面时, `empId` 控件都将使用查询字符串来绑定和显示数据,该查询字符串包含一个名为且具有相应值的字段。The control uses the control to bind and display data whenever the page is requested with a query string that contains a field that is named `empId` and that has a corresponding value. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1/CS/querystrparam1cs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1/VB/querystrparam1vb.aspx#3)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the values of the instance that is specified by the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数是一个受保护的复制构造函数, 用于克隆实例。 The constructor is a protected copy constructor that is used to clone a instance. 、和属性的值会传输到新的实例。The values of the , , and properties are transferred to the new instance.

The default is an empty string ("").

span.span: Initializes a new named instance of the class, using the specified string to identify which query-string field to bind to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用构造函数创建的对象使用指定的参数名称进行初始化,该参数名称标识参数绑定到的查询字符串字段。 A object that is created by using the constructor is initialized with the specified parameter name that identifies the query-string field that the parameter binds to. 用默认值初始化和属性。The and properties are initialized with default values. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用构造函数创建两个对象 , 并将它们添加到控件的集合中。The following example shows how to create two objects by using the constructor and add them to an control's collection. 如果和查询`country`字符串字段与请求一起传递并且它们具有有效值, 则控件将显示数据。 `employee`A control displays data if the `employee` and `country` query-string fields are passed with the request and if they have valid values. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_2/CS/qsp2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_2/VB/qsp2vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用构造函数创建的对象使用指定的参数名称、参数类型和标识参数绑定到的查询字符串字段的字符串进行初始化。 A object that is created by using the constructor is initialized with the specified parameter name, the parameter type, and a string that identifies the query-string field that the parameter binds to. 用默认值初始化和属性。The and properties are initialized with default values. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用构造函数创建对象并将其添加到控件的集合中。The following example shows how to create a object by using the constructor and add it to an control's collection. 如果和查询`country`字符串字段与请求一起传递并且它们具有有效值, 则控件将显示数据。 `employee`A control displays data if the `employee` and `country` query-string fields are passed with the request and if they have valid values. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_3/CS/qsp3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_3/VB/qsp3vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通过使用当前实例的值调用构造函数来初始化类的新实例。 The method calls the constructor to initialize a new instance of the class by using the values of the current instance.

span.span: The current instance of the request.

param.name: control

**Note** This parameter is not used.

summary.span: 更新并返回 对象的值。

span.span: Updates and returns the value of the object.

returns.span: 表示参数当前值的对象。

span.span: An object that represents the current value of the parameter.

returns.span: 如果上下文或请求为 ， 方法将返回 。

span.span: If the context or the request is , the method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每 次调用方法时, 对象都会尝试绑定到查询字符串字段。The object tries to bind to the query-string field every time that the method is called. 方法使用参数从查询字符串中检索指定的查询字符串字段的值。 `context`The `context` parameter is used by the method to retrieve the value of the specified query-string field from the query string. 忽略`control`参数。The `control` parameter is ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ QueryStringField { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.QueryStringField : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置参数所绑定的查询字符串字段的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the query-string field that the parameter binds to.

value.span: 参数所绑定的查询字符串字段的名称。

span.span: The name of the query-string field that the parameter binds to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识与查询字符串一起传递的名称/值对。The property identifies a name/value pair that is passed with the query string. 属性标识对的名称, 而属性在运行时绑定到其对应的值。 The property identifies the name of the pair, whereas the property binds to its corresponding value at run time. 如果所需的查询字符串名称/值对不会传递到带有查询字符串的页, 则该方法会尝试将参数绑定到属性的值。If the expected query-string name/value pair is not passed to the page with the query string, the method then tries to bind the parameter to the value of the property. 如果未设置该属性, 则该方法无法将参数绑定到值。If the property is not set, the method fails to bind the parameter to a value. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将对象与控件一起使用 , 以在控件中显示数据。The following example shows how to use a object together with a control to display data in a control. 属性设置为所需的查询字符串字段的名称, 并且将参数添加到集合中。 The property is set to the name of the expected query-string field, and the parameter is added to the collection. 如果名称/值对不与查询字符串一起传递, 则提供属性。A property is provided in case the name/value pair is not passed with the query string. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1/CS/querystrparam1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1/VB/querystrparam1vb.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示如何将对象与控件一起使用 , 以在控件中显示数据。The following example shows how to use a object together with a control to display data in a control. 对象与用于输出参数和返回值的其他参数对象一起添加到集合中。 The object is added to the collection, together with other parameter objects that are used for the output parameter and return value. 若要检索数据, 请处理从存储过程返回的值。To retrieve data, handle the values that are returned from the stored procedure. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example that is provided for the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1/CS/sql21cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1/VB/sql21vb.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ValidateInput { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ValidateInput : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置是否验证查询字符串参数的值。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the value of the query string parameter is being validated or not.

value.span: 如果查询参数的值有效，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the value of the query parameter is being validated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果页属性设置为`true`, 并且属性设置为`false`, 则不会验证查询字符串参数。If the page property is set to `true`, and the property is set to `false`, the query string parameter will not be validated. 但是, 如果页属性设置为`true`, 并且属性设置为`true`, 则将验证查询字符串参数。However, if the page property is set to `true`, and the property is set to `true`, the query string parameter will be validated. 如果将页属性设置为`false`, 则无论属性是否设置为`true`或`false`, 都将验证查询字符串参数。If the page property is set to `false`, the query string parameter will be validated regardless of whether the property is set to `true` or `false`.
